xpcproxy(8) System Manager's Manual xpcproxy(8)

NAME

xpcproxy —
configures the execution environment for XPC services.

DESCRIPTION

xpcproxy xpcproxy is an exec(3) trampoline that configures the environment for an XPC service's execution. This command is not intended to be invoked directly.

SEE ALSO

xpc(3)
21 Aug, 2012 Darwin
